Reviews.Title: Meiego Smart Peephole Viewer
Reviews.Author: janie Bristol
Reviews.Content: It was too complicated for a Senior to install and use!!!  So we sent it back.  There were no instructions included.  Very, very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: replacement of my original peephole works
Reviews.Author: trplshot
Reviews.Content: This was to replace my regular peephole so my wife and stepson could see who is outside easier.  It does this well.  As for Night vision, they could afford to place a few more IR LEDs on it so that the night vision actually works, right now it is very dim.

Reviews.Title: missing parts
Reviews.Author: William N geiermann
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time and in good shape. There were no instructions . I feel the unit had been opened and parts removed because there was no seal on the unit box inside the package.
